overview: Michael Jennesse manages HealthTech Management Services (HTMS) and affiliate company, HealthTech Solutions Group’s (HTSG) finances and oversees its corporate accounting practices. Jennesse has over 25 years of experience in healthcare management, including extensive experience in business intelligence and technology to drive operating improvements. Previously, he served in leadership roles at several hospitals with HCA and Universal Health. Most recently, he held regional financial positions at both Iasis Healthcare and HCA. Jennesse is a graduate of Florida State University in Tallahassee and holds a Master’s degree in Business Administration from Nova Southeastern University in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. He is a licensed Certified Public Accountant in the State of Florida.
